Articles.Content:
Is anyone aware of a fix for Kopernicus in 1.4.4? During the initial loading of the game it tells me Kopernicus doesn't support the game version, and it doesn't load the mod.

Is anyone aware of a fix or an update for Kopernicus? Thanks.
It's probably version locked. Don't worry, a lot of mods will need some time to get updated to 1.4.4 is all. Please be patient.

Just now, Just Jim said:

It's probably version locked. Don't worry, a lot of mods will need some time to get updated to 1.4.4 is all. Please be patient.

Can confirm that Kopernicus is version-locked. It does that to prevent bugs in versions it wasn't built for.

1 hour ago, som3whatsn3aky said:

Is anyone aware of a fix for Kopernicus in 1.4.4? During the initial loading of the game it tells me Kopernicus doesn't support the game version, and it doesn't load the mod.

﻿ Is anyone aware of a fix or an update for Kopernicus? Thanks. 

As JustJim and Mrcarrot have said, Kopernicus is version-locked. This was done so the developers dont hear about bugs that are caused by the mod being used on a version other than the one it was made for. You will just have to be patient.
